name: Soldier's Syringe
description: Gain +15% attack speed (+15% per stack).
Pairs well with attack speed, proc chance, and increased damage items.

name: Tougher Times
description: Gain a 15% chance (+15% per stack) to block damage.
Pairs well with barrier and damage reduction items.

name: Monster Tooth
description: Enemies drop healing orbs that heal 8hp + 2% of max health (+2% per stack).
Pairs well with on kill and amplified healing items.

name: Lens Maker's Glasses
description: Gain +10% chance (+10% per stack) to critically strike.
Pairs well with attack speed, increased damage, and proc chance items.

name: Paul's Goat Hoof
description: Gain +14% movement speed (+14% per stack).
Pairs well with movement speed and mobility items.

name: Bustling Fungus
description: Standing still heals allies within 3m (+1.5m per stack) for 4.5% of max health (+2.25% per stack).
Pairs well with amplified healing items.

name: Crowbar
description: Enemies above 90% health take 75% more damage (+75% per stack).
Pairs well with proc chance and high damage items.

name: Tri-Tip Dagger
description: Gain a 10% chance (+10% per stack) to bleed enemies for 240% base damage.
Pairs well with attack speed, proc chance, and debuff infliction items.

name: Warbanner
description: Drop banners when leveling up and starting teleporters, grants +30% attack and +30% movement speed to allies within 16m (+8m per stack).
Pairs well with attack speed and movement speed items.

name: Cautious Slug
description: Heal 3hp (+3hp per stack) per second while outside of danger.
Pairs well with amplified healing items.

name: Personal Shield Generator
description: Gain a shield equal to 8% of max health (+8% per stack). All shield recharges in 2s after 9s outside of danger.
Pairs well with shield and increased health items.

name: Medkit
description: Heal 20hp + 5% of max health (+5% per stack) 2s after taking damage.
Pairs well with items that activate after taking damage and amplified healing items.

name: Gasoline
description: Killing an enemy ignites nearby enemies within 12m (+4m per stack) for 3s, dealing 150% base damage. Burning enemies take 150% base damage (+75% per stack) per tick.
Pairs well with on kill and debuff infliction items.

name: Stun Grenade
description: Gain a 5% chance (+5% per stack) to stun enemies on hit for 2s.
Pairs well with attack speed and proc chance items.

name: Bundle of Fireworks
description: Activating an interactable launches 8 fireworks (+4 per stack) that deal 300% base damage.
Pairs well with increased damage, proc chance, and items that activate on interaction.

name: Energy Drink
description: Gain +25% movement speed (+25% per stack) while sprinting.
Pairs well with movement speed and mobility items.

name: Backup Magazine
description: Adds +1 charge (+1 per stack) to your Secondary skill.
Pairs well with cooldown reduction items.

name: Sticky Bomb
description: Gain a 5% chance (+5% per stack) to attach a bomb to enemies that detonates for 180% total damage.
Pairs well with attack speed, increased damage, and proc chance items.

name: Rusted Key
description: A hidden lockbox will appear somewhere on the next stage with an 80% chance to drop an Uncommon item and a 20% chance to drop a Legendary item. Consumed on use.
Pairs well with items that affect stage generation.

name: Armor-Piercing Rounds
description: Deal +20% damage (+20% per stack) to stage bosses.
Pairs well with attack speed and increased damage items.

name: Topaz Brooch
description: Gain +15 temporary barrier (+15 per stack) per kill.
Pairs well with items that activate after taking damage, on kill, and damage reduction items.

name: Focus Crystal
description: Deal +20% damage (+20% per stack) to enemies within 13m.
Pairs well with attack speed and increased damage items.

name: Bison Steak
description: Gain +25 max health (+25hp per stack).
Pairs well with shield and increased health items.

name: Repulsion Armor Plate
description: Reduce damage taken by 5 (+5 per stack).
Pairs well with items that activate after taking damage and damage reduction items.

name: Mocha
description: Gain +7.5% attack speed (+7.5% per stack) and +7% movement speed (+7% per stack).
Pairs well with attack speed, movement speed, and increased damage items.

name: Power Elixir
description: Heal for 75% of max health when below 25% of max health, protects Delicate Watch from breaking. Consumed on use.
Pairs well with items that activate after taking damage and amplified healing.

name: Delicate Watch
description: Deal +20% damage (+20% per stack), consumed when below 25% of max health.
Pairs well with attack speed and increased damage items.

name: Oddly Shaped Opal
description: Gain +100 armor (+100 per stack) outside of danger.
Pairs well with items that activate after taking damage and damage reduction items.

name: Roll of Pennies
description: Grants 3 gold (+3 per stack) after taking damage from an enemy. Scales with time.
Pairs well with items that activate after taking damage and damage reduction items.

name: AtG Missile Mk. 1
description: Gain a 10% chance to fire a missile dealing 300% total damage (+300% per stack).
Pairs well with attack speed, increased damage, and proc chance items.

name: Will-o'-the-Wisp
description: Killing an enemy creates a lava pillar with a 12m (+2.4m per stack) radius, dealing 350% base damage (+280% per stack).
Pairs well with increased damage, proc chance, and on kill items.

name: Hopoo Feather
description: Gain +1 extra jump (+1 per stack).
Pairs well with movement speed and mobility items.

name: Ukulele
description: Gain a 25% chance to arc lightning between 3 enemies (+2 per stack) within 20m (+2m per stack) of each other, dealing 80% total damage.
Pairs well with attack speed, increased damage, and proc chance items.

name: Leeching Seed
description: Heal 1hp (+1hp per stack) per hit.
Pairs well with attack speed, proc chance, and amplified healing items.

name: Predatory Instincts
description: Gain 5% critical strike chance from the first Predatory Instincts (does not stack). Critical strikes boost attack speed by 12% (+24% per stack) for 3s. Capped at 36%.
Pairs well with attack speed, critical strike chance, and proc chance items.

name: Red Whip
description: Gain +30% movement speed (+30% per stack) outside of combat.
Pairs well with movement speed and mobility items.

name: Old War Stealthkit
description: Become invisible and gain 40% movement speed for 5s when below 25% max health, 30s (-50% per stack) cooldown.
Pairs well with movement speed, items that activate after taking damage, mobility, and items that activate at low health.

name: Harvester's Scythe
description: Gain +5% critical strike chance, critical strikes heal for 8hp (+4hp per stack).
Pairs well with attack speed, critical strike chance, proc chance, and amplified healing items.

name: Fuel Cell
description: Adds +1 equipment charge (+1 per stack), reduces equipment cooldown by 15% (+15% per stack).
Pairs well with equipment cooldown reduction and equipment items.

name: Infusion
description: Killing enemies increases max health by 1hp, (+1hp per stack) capped at 100 (+100 per stack).
Pairs well with shield, increased health, and on kill effect items.

name: Bandolier
description: Enemies have an 18% chance (+10% per stack) to drop ammo packs, ammo packs reset skill cooldowns.
Pairs well with skill cooldown reduction and on kill effect items.

name: Berzerker's Pauldron
description: Killing 4 enemies within 1s boosts movement speed by 50% and attack speed by 100% for 6s (+4s per stack).
Pairs well with attack speed, movement speed, and on kill effect items.

name: Rose Buckler
description: Gain +30 armor (+30 per stack) while sprinting.
Pairs well with movement speed and damage reduction items.

name: Runald's Band
description: Hits dealing more than 400% damage slow the target by 80% for 3s (+3s per stack) and deal an aditional 250% total damage (+250% per stack). 10s cooldown.
Pairs well with high damage items.

name: Kjaro's Band
description: Hits dealing more than 400% damage deal an aditional 300% total damage over time. 10s cooldown.
Pairs well with high damage items.

name: Chronobauble
description: Slow enemies by 60% for 2s (+2s per stack) on hit.
Pairs well with attack speed, debuff infliction, and proc chance items.

name: Wax Quail
description: Jumping while sprinting boosts you forward by 10m (+10m per stack).
Pairs well with movement speed and mobility items.

name: Old Guillotine
description: Elite enemies below 13% health (+13% per stack) die instantly.
Pairs well with increased damage and items that activate after killing an elite enemy.

name: War Horn
description: Activating an equipment boosts attack speed by 70% for 8s (+4s per stack).
Pairs well with attack speed, equipment cooldown reduction, and equipment items.

name: Lepton Daisy
description: Heals allies within the teleporter for 50% of max health 1 time (+1 per stack) per teleporter.
Pairs well with items activate based on Teleporter charging.

name: Razorwire
description: Taking damage hits up to 5 enemies (+2 per stack) within 25m (+10m per stack) for 160% damage.
Pairs well with increased damage, items that activate after taking damage, and proc chance items.

name: Ghor's Tome
description: Enemies have a 4% (+4% per stack) to drop treasure worth 25 gold. Scales with time.
Pairs well with on kill and gold increase items.

name: Squid Polyp
description: Activating an interactable summons a Squid Turret which shoots at 100% attack speed (+100% per stack). Lasts 30s.
Pairs well with items that activate on interaction and items that summon allies.

name: Death Mark
description: Enemies inflicted with at least 4 debuffs take 50% more damage for 7s (+7s per stack).
Pairs well with increased damage and debuff infliction items.

name: Hunter's Harpoon
description: Killing an enemy increases movement speed by 125% for 1s (+0.5s per stack).
Pairs well with movement speed and on kill effect items.

name: Ignition Tank
description: Burning enemies take +300% fire damage (+300% per stack).
Pairs well with fire damage and debuff infliction items.

name: Shuriken
description: Using a Primary skill throws a shuriken dealing 400% base damage (+400% per stack), capped at 3 shurikens. 10s reload.
Pairs well with increased damage and proc chance.

name: Shipping Request Form
description: A delivery will arrive somewhere on the next stage containing two items, each item has a 79% chance to be Common, 20% chance to be Uncommon, and 1% chance to be Legendary.
Pairs well with items that affect stage generation.

name: Brilliant Behemoth
description: All attacks explode with a 4m (+2.5m per stack) radius and deal 60% more damage.
Pairs well with attack speed, increased damage, and proc chance items.

name: Ceremonial Dagger
description: Killing an enemy creates 3 homing daggers that deal 150% base damage (+150% per stack).
Pairs well with increased damage, proc chance, and on kill items.

name: Frost Relic
description: Killing an enemy creates a ring around the player that deals 1,200% damage per second to nearby enemies and slows them by 80% for 1.5s. Damage radius grows by 2m per kill, capped at 18m (+12m per stack).
Pairs well with incrased damage, proc chance, debuff infliction, and on kill effect items.

name: Happiest Mask
description: Gain a 7% chance to spawn a ghost ally that deals 1,500% damage after killing an enemy. Lasts 30s (+30s per stack).
Pairs well with ally summons and on kill effect items.

name: H3AD-5T v2
description: Increases jump height, hold 'interact' to slam. Slamming creates a 5m-100m explosion dealing 1,000%-10,000% base damage, damage scales with slam distance. 10s (-50% per stack) cooldown.
Pairs well with movement speed, increased damage, proc chance, and mobility items.

name: N'Kuahana's Opinion
description: Store 100% of healing (+100% per stack) as Soul Energy, when Soul Energy hits 10% of max health, fire a homing skull dealing 250% of Soul Energy as damage.
Pairs well with healing, increased damage, and amplified healing items.

name: Unstable Tesla Coil
description: Fire lightning that hits 3 enemies (+2 per stack) for 200% base damage every 0.5s. 10s cooldown.
Pairs well with increased damage, and proc chance items.

name: 57 Leaf Clover
description: All random effects are rolled +1 time (+1 per stack) for a favorable outcome.
Pairs well with critical strike chance and proc chance items.

name: Sentient Meat Hook
description: Gain a 20% chance (+20% per stack) on hit to fire hooks that pull up to 10 enemies (+5 per stack) together, dealing 100% total damage. Hooks are fired from the target enemy.
Pairs well with attack speed, increased damage, and proc chance items.

name: Alien Head
description: All skill cooldowns reduced by 25% (+25% per stack).
Pairs well with skill cooldown reduction items.

name: Soulbound Catalyst
description: Killing an enemy reduces equipment cooldowns by 4s (+2s per stack).
Pairs well with on kill effects, equipment cooldown reduction, and equipment items.

name: Dio's Best Friend
description: Grants +1 extra life (+1 per stack), gain 3s of invulnerability after resurrection. Consumed on use.
No currently known item synergies.

name: Hardlight Afterburner
description: Adds 2 charges (+2 per stack) to you Utility skill, reduces Utility skill cooldowns by 33%.
Pairs well with skill cooldown reduction items.

name: Wake of Vultures
description: Killing an elite enemy grants the player that enemy's elite ability for 8s (+5s per stack).
Pairs well with attack speed, debuff infliction, on kill effects, and items that activate after killing an elite enemy.

name: Brainstalks
description: Killing an elite enemy reduces all skill cooldowns to 0.5s for 4s (+4s per stack).
Pairs well with on kill effects, items that activate after killing an elite enemy, and skill cooldown reduction items.

name: Rejuvination Rack
description: Gain +100% healing power (+100% per stack).
Pairs well with healing and amplified healing items.

name: Aegis
description: Healing while at 100% of max health grants temporary barrier equal to 50% of the amount healed (+50% per stack).
Pairs well with healing, barrier, damage reduction, and amplified healing items.

name: Shattering Justice
description: Reduce enemy armor by 60 for 8s (+8s per stack) after hitting them 5 times.
Pairs well with attack speed, increased damage, and debuff infliction items.

name: Resonance Disc
description: Killing 4 enemies in 7s charges the Resonance Disc. Deals 300% base damage (+300% per stack), pierces enemies it doesn't kill, then explodes for 1,000% base damage (+1,000% per stack). Returns to the player and pierces enemies on the way back dealing 300% base damage (+300% per stack).

name: Interstellar Desk Plant
description: Killing an enemy drops a healing plant after 5s. Plants heal allies within 10m (+5m per stack) for 5% of max health every 0.5s. Lasts 10s.
Pairs well with on kill effects and amplified healing items.

name: Laser Scope
description: Critical strikes deal +100% damage (+100% per stack).
Pairs well with critical strike chance and increased damage items.

name: Pocket I.C.B.M.
description: Missile items and equipment fire 2 additional missiles per round, missiles deal +50% more damage per additional stack.
Pairs well with missile items.

name: Spare Drone Parts
description: Summon 1 Col. Droneman (+1 per stack). Drones gain +50% attack speed (+50% per stack), +50% cooldown reduction (+50% per stack), and 10% chance to fire a missile dealing 300% total damage. Drones gain a chain gun that fires 6 bullets dealing 100% damage, bullets bounce to up to 2 enemies.
Pairs well with ally summons.

name: Symbiotic Scorpion
description: Reduce armor by 2 (+2 per stack) on hit.
Pairs well with attack speed, increased damage, and debuff infliction items.

name: Ben's Rain Coat
description: Prevents 1 incoming debuff (+1 per stack) and grants temporary barrier for 10% of max health. 5s cooldown.
Pairs well with barrier and damage reduction items.

name: Bottled Chaos
description: Trigger 1 additional random equipment effect (+1 per stack) after using an equipment.
Pairs well with equipment cooldown reduction and equipment items.

name: Titanic Knurl
description: Gain +40% max health (+40 per stack) and +1.6hp per second base health regeneration (+1.6 per stack).

name: Queen's Gland
description: Summon 1 Beetle Guard (+1 per stack) every 30s, deals 300% damage and has 100% health.

name: Halcyon Seed
description: Summons Aurelionite before a boss fight, deals 100% damage (+50% per stack) and has 100% health (+100% per stack).

name: Little Disciple
description: Fire a homing wisp dealing 300% damage (+300% per stack) every 1.6s while sprinting. Fire rate increases with movement speed.

name: Pearl
description: Gain +10% max health (+10% per stack).

name: Irradiant Pearl
description: Gain +10% health, +10% regeneration, +10% movement speed, +10% damage, +10% attack speed, +10% critical strike chance, and +10% armor.

name: Genesis Loop
description: Explode when below 25% max health dealing 6,000% base damage. 30 / 2s (+1 per stack) cooldown.

name: Molten Perforator
description: Gain a 10% chance on hit to fire 3 magma balls from the target that deal 300% damage (+300% per stack) each and ignite enemies.

name: Shatterspleen
description: Gain +5% critical strike chance. Critical strikes bleed enemies for 240% base damage, bleeding enemies explode dealing 400% damage (+400% per stack) + 15% of their max health (+15% per stack).

name: Mired Urn
description: Deal 100% damage to 1 nearby enemy (+1 per stack) while in combat and inflict them with tar, heal 100% of the damage dealt.

name: Charged Perforator
description: Gain a 10% chance to strike lightning on hit dealing 500% damage (+500% per stack).

name: Empathy Cores
description: Summon 2 Solus Probes every 30s, probes gain +100% damage (+100% per stack) per ally.

name: Planula
description: Heal 15hp (+15 per stack) after taking damage.

name: Defense Nucleus
description: Killing an elite monster summons an Alpha Construct that deals 300% damage and has 300% health. Capped at 4. (+4 per stack)

name: Benthic Bloom
description: Upgrades 3 random Common or Uncommon item stacks (+3 per stack) to the next rarity at the beginning of each stage. Corrupts all 57 Leaf Clovers.

name: Encrusted Key
description: A hidden cache will appear somewhere on the next stage allowing the player to select from 3 items, cache contents have a 41.66% chance to be Common, 41.66% to be Uncommon, and a 16.66% chance to be Legendary. Consumed on use, corrupts all Rusted Keys.

name: Lost Seer's Glasses
description: Attacks have a 0.05% chance (+0.05% per stack) to instantly kill non-boss enemies. Corrupts all Lens Maker's Glasses.

name: Lysate Cell
description: Adds 1 charge (+1 per stack) to your Special skill, reduces Special skill cooldown by 33%. Corrupts all Fuel Cells.

name: Needletick
description: Gain +10% chance (+10% per stack) to inflict an enemy with Collapse, dealing damage. Corrupts all Tri-Tip Daggers.

name: Newly Hatched Zoea
description: Summon a random void monster as an ally every 60s, up to 1 ally (+1 per stack) at a time. Corrupts all yellow items.

name: Plasma Shrimp
description: Gain +10% of max health as shield. Fire missiles on hit that deal 40% total damage (+40% per stack) on hit while you have shield. Corrupts all AtG Missile Mk. 1s.

name: Pluripotent Larva
description: Grants +1 extra life (+1 per stack), gain 3s of invulnerability after resurrection. Corrupts all held items that have Void counterparts on death. Consumed on use.

name: Polylute
description: Gain a 25% chance to fire lightning at the targeted enemy on hit dealing 60% total damage, lightning hits up to 3 times (+3 per stack). Corrupts all Ukuleles.

name: Safer Spaces
description: Blocks the next source of incoming damage. 15s cooldown (-10% per stack). Corrupts all Tougher Times.

name: Singularity Band
description: Hits dealing at least 400% damage creates a black hole that draws in enemies within 15m. Black holes last 5s before collapsing, dealing 100% total damage. 20s cooldown. Corrupts all Kjaro's Bands and Runald's Bands.

name: Tentabauble
description: Gain a 5% chance (+5% per stack) to root enemies on hit for 1s. Corrupts all Chronobaubles.

name: Voidsent Flame
description: Hitting an enemy at full health creates a lava pillar with a 12m radius (+2.4m per stack) that deals 260% base damage. Corrupts all Will-o'-the-Wisps.

name: Weeping Fungus
description: Heal 2% of max health per second while sprinting. Corrupts all Bustling Fungi.

name: Shaped Glass
description: Gain +100% base damage (+100% per stack), lose 50% max health (+50% per stack).

name: Brittle Crown
description: Gain a 30% change to gain 2 gold (+2 per stack) on hit. Scales with time. Lose gold when taking damage, gold loss equals 100% of the health lost (+100% per stack).

name: Transcendence
description: Gain +50% max health (+25% per stack), converts all health into shield.

name: Corpsebloom
description: Gain +100% healing power (+100% per stack), all healing is applied over time. Heal up to 10% of max health (-50% per stack) per second.

name: Gesture of the Drowned
description: Reduce equipment cooldowns by 50% (+15% per stack), equipment activates automatically.

name: Strides of Heresy
description: Replaces Utility skill with Shadowfade. Become intangible for 3s (+3s per stack), gain +30% movement speed, heal 18.2% of max health (+18.2% per stack).

name: Visions of Heresy
description: Replaces Primary skill with Hungering Gaze. Fires homing shards that detonate dealing 120% base damage, holds up to 12 charges (+12 per stack). 2s reload (+2s per stack).

name: Beads of Fealty
description: Entering a Celestial Portal and obliterating at the Obelisk with Beads of Fealty transports the player to A Moment, Whole before ending the run.

name: Focused Convergence
description: Gain +30% teleporter charging speed (+30% per stack), lose 50% teleporter zone size (+50% per stack). Capped at 3.

name: Defiant Gouge
description: Using a shrine summons enemies (stronger per stack) nearby. Scales with time.

name: Mercurial Rachis
description: Randomly summons a totem near the player, totems grant allies and enemies within 16m (+50% per stack) +50% attack damage.

name: Purity
description: Reduce all skill cooldowns by 2s, negative effects are rerolled +1 time (+1 per stack) for an unfavorable outcome.

name: Hooks of Heresy
description: Replaces Secondary skill with Slicing Maelstrom. Charge a projectile that deals 875% damage per second and explodes after 3s dealing 700% damage, inflicts enemies with the root debuff for 3s (+3s per stack). 5s (+5 per stack) cooldown.

name: Egocentricism
description: Gain an orbiting bomb every 3s (-50% per stack), detonates on impact for 360% damage. Capped at 3 bombs (+1 per stack). A random item is converted into another stack of Egocentricism every 60s.

name: Eulogy Zero
description: Gain a 5% chance (+5% per stack) for any item on the next stage to be a lunar item instead of its previous rarity.

name: Stone Flux Pauldron
description: Gain +100% max health (+100% per stack), lose 50% movement speed (+50% per stack).

name: Light Flux Pauldron
description: Reduce all skill cooldowns by 50% (+50% per stack), lose 50% attack speed (+50% per stack).

name: Essence of Heresy
description: Replaces Special skill with Ruin. Dealing damage adds a stack of ruin that lasts for 10s (+10s per stack), activate the skill to detonate enemies inflicted with ruin dealing 300% + 120% damage per stack of ruin. 8s (+8s per stack) cooldown.

name: Glowing Meteorite
description: Call meteors from the sky that deal 600% damage to enemies and allies. Lasts 20s, 140s cooldown.

name: Helfire Tincture
description: Ignite all enemies and allies within 15m for 12s dealing 5% of max health per second as burn damage. Burn damage is 0.5x stronger toward you, 0.25x stronger toward allies, and 25x stronger toward enemies. 45s cooldown.

name: Effigy of Grief
description: Places a totem at the user's cursor. Enemies and allies within the totem's radius are inflicted with cripple, slowed by 50%, and have 20 less armor. 15s cooldown.

name: Spinel Tonic
description: +100% damage, +70% attack speed, +20 armor, +50% max health, +300% regeneration, and +30% movement speed for 20s. When Tonic wears off the user has a 20% chance to gain a stack of Tonic Affliction, which reduces all stats by 5% (+5% per stack) while not using by Spinel Tonic. 60s cooldown.

name: Disposable Missile Launcher
description: Fire 12 missiles dealing 300% damage each. 45s cooldown.

name: Foreign Fruit
description: Heal 50% of max health on use. 45s cooldown.

name: Primordial Cube
description: Create a blackhole that draws in enemies within 30m for 10s. 60s cooldown.

name: Trophy Hunter's Tricorn
description: Instantly kill a boss enemy and cause it to drop its repsective Boss Item. Single use, consumed on use.

name: Ocular HUD
description: Gain +100% critical strike chance for 8s. 60s cooldown.

name: The Backup
description: Summon 4 Strike Drones that last 25s. 100s cooldown.

name: Preon Accumulator
description: Fire an energy ball dealing 4,000% damage, enemies within 35m are struck by energy tendrils dealing 600% damage. 140s cooldown.

name: Goobo Jr.
description: Summon a gummy clone with 300% health and 300% damage. Lasts 30s, 100s cooldown.

name: Milky Chrysalis
description: Gain +20% movement speed on use, gain the ability to fly for 15s. 60s cooldown.

name: Royal Capacitor
description: Strike the targeted enemy with lightning dealing 3,000% damage, stun nearby enemies. 20s cooldown.

name: Molotov (6-Pack)
description: Throw 6 molotovs that ignite nearby enemies for 500% base damage, each molotov leaves a burning area that deals 200% damage per second. 45s cooldown.

name: Executive Card
description: Get 10% off all purchases made useing gold, all multishop contents become available for purchase. 0.1s cooldown.

name: The Crowdfunder
description: Fire bullets that deal 100% damage per bullet while active, each bullet costs 1 gold. Cost scales with time.

name: Gnarled Woodsprite
description: Heals you for 1.5% of max health per second, may be sent to an ally to heal them for 10% of max health per second. 15s cooldown.

name: Radar Scanner
description: Reveal all interactables within 500m for 10s. 45s cooldown.

name: Eccentric Vase
description: Create a quantum tunnel at your cursor up to 1,000m away. Lasts for 30s, 45s cooldown.

name: Blast Shower
description: Remove all negative effects and destroy projectiles within a very small radius. 20s cooldown.

name: Volcanic Egg
description: Turn into a fireball for 5s dealing 500% damage on impact, detonate for 800% damage. Hitting an enemy in fireball form resets the 5s time limit. 30s cooldown.

name: Jade Elephant
description: Gain +500 armor for 5s. 45s cooldown.

name: Sawmerang
description: Throw 3 Sawmerangs that deal 400% damage, pierce enemies, and inflict bleed for 100% damage per second. 45s cooldown.

name: Recycler
description: Reroll an item into another item of the same rarity, items can only be rerolled once. 45s cooldown.

name: Super Massive Leech
description: Heal 20% of the damage dealt for the next 8s. 60s cooldown.

name: Gorag's Opus
description: Gain +50% movement speed and +100% attack speed for all allies for 7s. 45s cooldown.

name: Forgive Me Please
description: Throw a doll that triggers all on-kill effects every second for 8s. 45s cooldown.

name: Remote Caffeinator
description: Call in a vending machine that lands after 5s dealing 2,000% damage to nearby enemies. Interact to purchase 3 soda cans which heal allies within 25m for 25% of max health, can be used 12 times. Each purchase costs 5 gold, cost scales with time. 60s cooldown.

name: Ifrit's Distinction
description: All attacks ignite enemies dealing 50% total damage, the holder leaves a trail of fire.

name: His Reassurance
description: Heal allies within 30m for 40% of the holder's base damage 4 times per second, drop a healing orb on death.

name: Silence Between Two Strikes
description: 50% of the holder's health is converted to shield, all attacks attach lightning bombs to the target which deal 50% total damage after exploding.

name: Her Biting Embrace
description: All attacks greatly slow enemies for 1.5s multiplied by the attack's proc coefficient, explode on death and freeze nearby enemies.

name: N'Kuahana's Retort
description: All attacks inflict the Healing Disabled debuff for 8s. The holder periodically releases 3-4 malachite spikes which explode on impact and deal 100% damage, explosions leave lingering malachite spikes. Summon a Malachite Urchin on death which will shoot at nearby monsters.

name: Spectral Circlet
description: Attacks greatly slow enemies, nearby allies are made invisible.

name: Shared Design
description: Gain +30% movement speed and +25% max health, all health is converted to shield. Attacks inflict the Cripple debuff. Fire 4 bombs every 10s dealing 30% damage.
